# MACP Research Assistant

> MACP-Powered AI Research Assistant: Track, trace, and recall AI-powered research with complete citation provenance across multiple AI assistants.

## What This Project Does

This is a CLI-based research tracking tool built on the Multi-Agent Communication Protocol (MACP). It enables researchers using multiple AI assistants to maintain complete provenance of their research workflow — from paper discovery through analysis to citation.

## Core Capabilities

- **Paper Discovery** (`macp discover`): Find papers via HuggingFace Daily Papers API, HuggingFace Paper Search API, arXiv API, or hysts/daily-papers dataset (12,700+ curated papers)
- **AI Analysis** (`macp analyze`): Send papers to LLMs (Gemini/Claude/OpenAI) for automated summarization, insight extraction, methodology identification, and research gap detection. BYOK with free-tier default. Includes consent prompt before sending data.
- **Agent Handoff** (`macp handoff`): Create structured multi-agent research handoffs with knowledge state snapshots (proto-A2A)
- **Learning Tracking** (`macp learn`): Record insights and learnings linked to specific papers with agent attribution
- **Citation Management** (`macp cite`): Track citations from papers into projects with full provenance
- **Knowledge Recall** (`macp recall`): Search across papers, learning sessions, citations, and handoffs using natural language
- **Report Export** (`macp export`): Generate Markdown research reports with optional tag filtering
- **Knowledge Graph** (`knowledge_graph.py`): Generate relationship graphs between papers, sessions, citations, agents, and projects
- **Status Overview** (`macp status`): View current state of the research knowledge base

## Architecture

The project uses a `.macp/` directory structure with JSON files validated against schemas:

- `.macp/research_papers.json` — All discovered and analyzed papers
- `.macp/learning_log.json` — Learning sessions with insights
- `.macp/citations.json` — Citation records linking papers to projects
- `.macp/knowledge_graph.json` — Generated relationship graph
- `.macp/handoffs.json` — Multi-agent handoff records

## Key Files for AI Agents

- `tools/macp_cli.py` — Main CLI entry point (run with `python tools/macp_cli.py`)
- `tools/paper_fetcher.py` — Paper discovery and MACP storage library
- `tools/llm_providers.py` — Multi-provider LLM interface (Gemini, Claude, OpenAI) with BYOK
- `tools/knowledge_graph.py` — Knowledge graph generation and provenance tracing
- `schemas/` — JSON Schema definitions for all MACP data files
- `templates/` — Empty template files for initializing new MACP directories
- `docs/ARCHITECTURE.md` — Full system architecture
- `docs/QUICK_START.md` — Beginner implementation guide
- `docs/STRATEGIC_ANALYSIS_AND_ENHANCED_PLAN.md` — Current strategic plan and roadmap

## Usage

```bash
# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Discover papers by date
python tools/macp_cli.py discover --date 2026-02-15

# Search for papers
python tools/macp_cli.py discover --query "multi-agent communication"

# Fetch specific paper
python tools/macp_cli.py discover --arxiv-id 2602.06570

# Search hysts/daily-papers dataset (12,700+ curated papers)
python tools/macp_cli.py discover --hysts "multi-agent collaboration" --limit 5

# AI-powered analysis (requires GEMINI_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, or OPENAI_API_KEY)
export GEMINI_API_KEY=your-key-here
python tools/macp_cli.py analyze 2602.06570
python tools/macp_cli.py analyze 2602.06570 --provider anthropic --yes

# Create a multi-agent handoff
python tools/macp_cli.py handoff --from claude --to gemini --summary "Research session complete" \
  --completed "Analyzed 5 papers;Built knowledge graph" --pending "Review gaps" --papers 2602.06570

# Record a learning insight
python tools/macp_cli.py learn "Key finding about X" --papers 2602.06570 --agent claude

# Record a citation
python tools/macp_cli.py cite 2602.06570 --project "GODELAI" --context "Used for C-S-P design"

# Recall knowledge
python tools/macp_cli.py recall "conflict data alignment"

# Export to Markdown report
python tools/macp_cli.py export
python tools/macp_cli.py export --tag agentic-ai --output report.md

# Check status
python tools/macp_cli.py status
```

## Ecosystem

- **Part of:** YSenseAI Ecosystem (https://github.com/creator35lwb-web)
- **Protocol:** MACP v2.0 (Multi-Agent Communication Protocol)
- **Validation:** VerifiMind-PEAS X-Z-CS RefleXion Trinity
- **License:** MIT
- **Status:** Pre-Alpha
